description:
Hi, and thanks for checking out this course.

From the start, let me reassure you that this course does not contain any fluff or filler content.

It is packed full of practical, actionable content to keep you actively learning, booth during and after the video content.

You will be be provide with a wide range of multimedia content that takes a creative view at business branding and personal development.

Whether you’re just starting out, you’ve got through your first few years of growth, or you’ve been in business for many years and it’s now time to pivot, rebrand and transition into a new marketplace, This course is going to provide you with the practical and creative steps to walk you through the process.

WHY IS THIS COURSE IMPORTANT?

There are many misconceptions about branding and brand equity. Some people believe branding is just about design.

Ask the average person to define a companies brand and they will start describing the company logo.

Unfortunately there are many business owners who also don’t fully understand the depth and breath of branding.

Yes the logo is one representation of the brand as it does the work of visually identifying a product or service related to the company. But if you just stop there you’re not branding – you’re tagging.

Admittedly, the origin of branding came from placing a mark or symbol on cattle, to identify who they belong to, but the practice of branding has developed immensely since then.

It’s not very difficult to place an image on a product and call it a brand. It’s a bit like printing some visuals on a T-shirt and claiming to have a clothing line. There is much more to Branding than names, fonts, colours and graphics.

From developing a brand mission statement and vision, are brand strategy, establishing a brand voice, and defining a brand promise.

It is not a process that can simply take place in the office while trying to juggle all the other tasks involved in running your business.

Creating a sustainable, iconic brand can take weeks, months and even years of brainstorming and whiteboarding, reviewing and redesigning, scripting and rewriting and split testing in different customer segments.

It is very easy to get a brand wrong.

We will never know or be able to number the amount of brands that have been developed and failed miserably, never seen the light of day in the marketplace.

But those companies that understand the correct process of branding can be clearly identified just by looking at those brands which has stood the test of time. And even looking at those younger brands (less than 20 years old) that have quickly risen to the top of their industry and stand head and shoulders above their competitors.

HOW WILL THIS COURSE BE DELIVERED?

Tony has always been a very hands-on, Practical person, and he is a creative at the core, and this is the approach he takes when delivering this course.

You will not be overwhelmed with theory. This course is about “The Doing”.

Tony waited a long time to pivot, and finally position himself in the business and marketing sector as he wanted to build a business and brand from scratch first, before he started talking and teaching about the topic.

Tony now runs his own company, works from home, spends lots of time with my family, serve as Treasurer and Administrator at his church and provides employment for others.

Everything He brings to this course he has learnt through first-hand implementation so he is not going to tell you anything that he hasn’t already first tried to implement himself.

WHAT WILL YOU GET FROM THIS COURSE?

This course will help you to bypass the stress and frustration that comes from being overwhelmed with the massive task of rebranding and repositioning your business.

It will give you strategies to help manage and reduce the resistance to change within your workforce.

It will give you processes you can implement to ensure your entire workforce contribute to the process of re-branding and the development of new products and services.

You will overcome the feeling of isolation, knowing that there are others who are currently going through or have successfully gone through the process of rebranding a business.

WHAT YOU WONT GET FROM THIS COURSE:

You’re not going to get a load of regurgitated content and you can get from other business and marketing course.

Everything you’ll get from Tony will be unique.
title: How To Increase The Value Of Your Business Brand
